name: Study Room Dark Theme
description: A dark theme for Study Room.

  [role="link"]:hover #mw-page-base,
  [role="link"]:hover * #mw-page-base,
  [role="button"]:hover * #mw-page-base,
  [role="menuitem"]:hover #mw-page-base,
  [role="menuitem"]:hover * #mw-page-base,
  .link:hover #mw-page-base,
  .link:hover * #mw-page-base {
    background-image: none !important;
  }
  a:hover img,
  a:hover * img,
  a:visited:hover img,
  a:visited:hover * img,
  span[onclick]:hover img,
  div[onclick]:hover img,
  [role="link"]:hover img,
  [role="link"]:hover * img,
  [role="button"]:hover * img,
  [role="menuitem"]:hover img,
  [role="menuitem"]:hover * img,
  .link:hover img,
  .link:hover * img {
    opacity: .7 !important;
    transition: opacity 0.2s;
  }
  a:hover img:hover,
  a:hover * img:hover,
  a:visited:hover img:hover,
  a:visited:hover * img:hover,
  span[onclick]:hover img:hover,
  div[onclick]:hover img:hover,
  [role="link"]:hover img:hover,
  [role="link"]:hover * img:hover,
  [role="button"]:hover * img:hover,
  [role="menuitem"]:hover img:hover,
  [role="menuitem"]:hover * img:hover,
  .link:hover img:hover,
  .link:hover * img:hover,
  a:hover a:hover img,
  a:hover * a:hover img,
  a:visited:hover a:hover img,
  a:visited:hover * a:hover img,
  span[onclick]:hover a:hover img,
  div[onclick]:hover a:hover img,
  [role="link"]:hover a:hover img,
  [role="link"]:hover * a:hover img,
  [role="button"]:hover * a:hover img,
  [role="menuitem"]:hover a:hover img,
  [role="menuitem"]:hover * a:hover img,
  .link:hover a:hover img,
  .link:hover * a:hover img {
    opacity: 1 !important;
  }
  /*----- ABOUT PAGES BACKGROUND -----*/
  @-moz-document url-prefix(about) {
    #newtab-window,
    #addons-page {
      background: #151515 !important;
    }
    * {
      background-color: transparent;
    }
    body > * {
      background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) !important;
    }
    #list-view {
      background: #111111 !important;
    }
    #detail-view {
      background: #222222 !important;
    }
    #addons-page > * > *,
    #addons-page > * > * > * {
      border-color: #333333 !important;
    }
  }
  /*----- SHOW INSTALLS ON USERSTYLES.ORG -----*/
  @-moz-document domain(userstyles.org) {
    li[total-install-count]:after {
      font-size: .70em !important;
      content: " (Installs: " attr(total-install-count) ", " attr(weekly-install-count) " wk)";
    }
  }
  /*----- RIGHT-CLICK MENUS & TOOLTIP STYLE -----*/
  #contentAreaContextMenu menuitem[disabled="true"],
  #contentAreaContextMenu menuitem[disabled="true"] menuseparator {
    display: none !important;
  }
  menupopup,
  popup,
  popup > menu > menupopup,
  menupopup > menu > menupopup {
    -moz-appearance: none !important;
    background: rgba(15, 15, 15, 0.9) !important;
    border: 1px solid #000 !important;
    border-radius: 3px !important;
    box-shadow: inset 0 0 1px #777, inset 0 0 10px #000 !important;
    padding: 2px 0 !important;
  }
  menupopup * {
    box-shadow: none !important;
    color: #777777 !important;
  }
  menupopup menuitem:hover * {
    color: #F0F0F0 !important;
    text-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(255, 255, 200, 0.9) !important;
  }
  menupopup menuseparator {
    -moz-appearance: none !important;
    background: transparent !important;
    margin: 2px 0 2px -3px !important;
    padding: 0 !important;
    border-top: none !important;
    border-color: transparent !important;
    box-shadow: 0 0 3px #666666 !important;
  }
  menupopup menuitem {
    -moz-appearance: none !important;
    background: transparent !important;
    text-shadow: 0 1px #000000 !important;
  }
  tooltip {
    -moz-appearance: none !important;
    color: #CCC !important;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8) !important;
    border: 1px solid #555 !important;
    border-radius: 3px !important;
  }
  /*----- FIX WHITE NEW TAB FLASH -----*/
  tabbrowser tabpanels,
  #appcontent > #content {
    background: #151515 !important;
  }
}
